abstract: Directed by Amy Berg, "West of Memphis" chronicles the case of Damien Echols, Jason Baldwin and Jessie Misskelley Jr., who in 1994 were convicted of the murders of three boys in West Memphis, Ark., and who were released from prison last August but are not considered innocent men in the eyes of the law.

headline.main: Peter Jackson's West Memphis Three Documentary Acquired by Sony Pictures Classics
headline.print_headline: Sony Pictures Classics Gets ‘West of Memphis’
